description: This former factory was refurbished in 2011 by SPACE to provide studios for artists and creative makers. Weber Industries, a bespoke fabrication and custom design studio, has operated in the street-facing ground floor studios since 2012.

factsheet.heading: Our Work
paragraphs: Weber Industies is a bespoke fabrication and design consultancy studio based in south-east London.
From our studio we are able to develop projects from design conception through to fabrication and installation.

Our flexible workspace can facilitate production in a diverse range of materials and processes, ranging in scale from intricate objects to structural architectural features. We offer comprehensive fabrication services in a variety of materials, from wood and metal to Corian and Jesmonite.

Our established network of partners enables us to deliver technologically advanced solutions to production. All projects are completed in-house, providing us with a high degree of flexibility and control over every aspect of each project.
We offer design services tailored to suit the needs of each client. We can work from simple sketches, or develop initial concepts into CAD models and full architectural plans.

As well as bespoke fabrication and custom design we offer project management and consultation services. Our approach integrates design with making, allowing us to develop elegant and efficient fabrication and installation methods for even the most complex or unusual projects.
